question:
QUE SERA SERA    When I was just a little girl
I asked my mother, what will I be
Will I be pretty
Will I be rich

Here's what she said to me
Que será, será
Whatever will be, will be
The future's not ours to see
Que será, será

soal

When did the writer ask to her mother about the future?

What does the sentence “ the future’s not our to see “ mean ?

Translate the words into Indonesian, Whatever will be , will be .
Have you told your parents what are you going to be in the future ?

How’s your parents respond and suggestion for you to get your future ?

plis bantuin ༎ຶ‿༎ຶ
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. when she was a little girl

2. The future belongs to God, we can't see our future

3. apa yang terjadi terjadilah

4. (apakah kamu sudah bilang pd ortu mu ingin jd apa km di masa depan?)

- yes I have, I want to be a teacher or a business girl, which is important useful for many people

5. they support me, and always remind me to dream but be realistic, and failure is natural

Penjelasan:

smoga membantu◉‿◉

They .....( 6 ).... any animals , but they ....( 7 ).. any pets because they live in an appartment    plisss​

2. is standing

3. is teaching / is telling

6. love

7. do not have

related_questions.question:
Change verb in the bracket being a right verb.    For example: My father (wash) his car twice a month.
My father (washes) his car twice a month.
(He)
1.Tio (sweep) his room every morning.

2.Andin (go) to school everyday.

3.I and my family (eat) three times a day.

4.My father (work) hard.

5.My uncles (visit) our home every month.

6.My little sister (sleep) soundly.

7.Tia and Nia (study) every night.

8.My mother (watch) Hercai drama.

9.My friends (come) to my birthday party.

10.Mrs. Mala (teach) English.​

dijawab please

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. Tio sweeps his room every morning.

2. Andin goes to school everyday.

3. I and my family eat three times a day.

4. My father works hard.

5. My uncles visit our home every month.

6. My little sister sleeps soundly.

7. Tia and Nia study every night.

8. My mother watches Hercai drama.

9. My friends come to my birthday party.

10. Mrs. Mala teaches English.

Semoga membantu ^_^

related_questions.question:
Fill in the blanks with tobe (am/ is/ are).    For example : My mother ... beautiful.
 My mother is beautiful.
 (She)
1.My friends ... in the library.

2.I and my brothers ... at our uncle home.

3.My sisters ... diligent and smart.

4.My aunts ... kind and beuatiful.

5.The tiger ... wild.

6.The sharpener ... sharp.

7.Anton and Andi ... in the field.

8.My niece ... still baby.

9.The teachers ... in the classroom.

10.My grandmother and my grandfather ... at our home.

pliss dijawab
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. is

2. are

3. is

4. is

5. is

6. is

7. are

8. is

9. are

10. are
